text: Friedrich Altmeyer (26 November 1928 – 13 November 2013) was a German footballer who played for SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards
title: Fritz Altmeyer
